column4: ok, so im a total windows refugee. This is my first time ever using linux. Im on a 20minutes fresh install of ubuntu and im trying to figure out how to add my sata storage drive so i can access files on it.... any suggestions?
are you into self help? your machine has EVERYTHING on it to help you
open a console and type "man mount" and/or "man fstab"
man is a command to display "man"ual pages for programs and settings
